## User story

>AS A user
>
>I WANT something implemented
>
>SO THAT I can benefit of it


## Acceptance criteria


>GIVEN conditions
>
>WHEN event
>
>THEN outcome

>GIVEN conditions
>
>WHEN event
>
>THEN outcome
